page.title: 17Visiting a Safari Park
page.content: Last Sunday we went with our next door neighbours by car to{Knowsley {Safari Park.} It was very hot in the car because we had to keep the windows shut. First we went through the lion enclosure. They were all loose. A notice said if lions approach or attack, sound the horn and wait for a white hunter. One lion started to approach. My sister started to scream and my mum went from 15 to 30 mph. We were luck the gates were open or we would have crashed. After all that we went into the monkey enclosure. There were lots of them all over the car. They were having fights on the bonnet, one fell backwards onto the aerial and it snapped. After that we went to the picnic area to have something to eat. Ian Higginson
